content.detailedDescription: Driving down highway 15 south, southern direction towards us border in lacolle. appeared at top of car windshield and crossed visible sky at incredible speed before disappearing on the horizon. dark sky, no other aerial traffic. blue-green orb with well defined contour and intense brightness. surprised, i tried to comprehend the phenomenon by mentally reviewing various possible explanations.
content.summary: Bright orb in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was out side and heard a swishing sound so i looked up and there it was so i took a picture  have always believed in extraterrestrials and now i have proof
content.summary: Amazing disc shape it looked stunning

content.detailedDescription: Not much more to tell about the event just have never seen anything like it before.
content.summary: Went outside to smoke and feed cats then i saw the lights went to go tell son about it he came out and then they were gone.

content.detailedDescription: When living in brinnington on my way home to middlesex rd.On my mountain bike i stopped on the foot bridge over the train track looking up i saw a coin shaped craft 60 ft.Across 4-5 ft.Vertical matt black in colour totally silent & 80-100 ft.Up appear into view over head & continued on strait out of view over the houses across middlesex rd.At first i was shocked then excited thinking i had seen an extra terrestrial craft but then remembered the i could only conclude was anti radar paint then & since i have thought so i didn't report it because it struck me as being military possibly so didn't want to rock the boat so to speak till now.
content.summary: The craft was coin shaped silent 60 ft across 80-100 ft up & coverd  in anti radar paint.

content.detailedDescription: Look
content.summary: Don't move ! alien in suit!  fingers do something like a shadow ! impossible you can see only with night vision! its not a dirt !

content.detailedDescription: I was out back meditating after a workout & noticed a silver boomerang appear staight above me, seemed to be stationary as i watched in awe, grabbed my camera and started recording, this object then began morphing from 1-3 vertically aligned turquoise lights in a pulsating fashion. recorded plane flying near object at the end of recording. this craft seemed to have some advanced electromagnetic type of propulsion from the light it was giving off & the craft seemed to be ejecting highly charged ions as it sparkled & morphed shape. i witnessed this object the day prior to this event & made sure to be ready with nice camera incase i saw it again & sure enough it appeared! i have seen multiple sightings since this incident & will finally be reporting those as well. recorded on a canon t6 with a 300mm lense! i'm big on chi gong & other practices of meditation & feel as if there is an underlying connection. i have recorded & took pictures of multiple sightings of different objects since these events. i've had 1 similar incident of a morphing style craft i got pictures of on cell phone, it seemed also to materialize as a boomerang & changed to a triangle/squarish object as it descended really low altitude above me, so low to where i could see detail on the craft with two black lines in triangle shape on craft with other faint details, this object seemed to morph into a black boomerang to a black circular object at its center then back to the original form i saw it. during this morphing it seemed to be giving off other tiny black objects. i will never forget the awe feeling as it came down so low & the sensation of it interacting with me. i'll add a pictures of this event to on the last file.
content.summary: Appeared giant silver boomerang, morphed from 1-3 glowing orb lights. pulsated, ionized air.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside my house and it is a hill side area, and  going up to the top to my friends house and suddenly a meteor like thing visible from the other side of the hill and at first i thaught it was a meteor .And it was coming in straight line towards my direction and ans as comes towards my direction it become more visible and i saw almost the exact shape, it was disc shaped and glowing and the color was black and it was flying low,and there were no sounds from that thing that freeks me ..Then the direction of that thing changed almost 90 degree it was a fast turn and this is a rural area and no military areas are here or around the place and i never saw a thing like that before that incident  and also two of my friends from a near place saw two fire balls like thing and also changed direction     they told this to me yesterday that why i m writing this
content.summary: It was round or disc shaped,and glowing  first comes in straight line and suddenly changed direction

content.detailedDescription: It was about 8:00pm on sunday evening october 15, 2017. i was driving west towards san antonio, tx on interstate 10. it was starting to get dark and i noticed a light off to my left above the horizon. this light was very bright and at first i thought it might be a star or maybe an aircraft of some kind. what was weird about it was it seemed like 1 bright light with 2 dimmer lights that merged into 1 bright light and then it seemed to fall towards the earth at a very fast speed, faster than i've ever seen anything travel in the sky. it was like it was free falling and then i would guess that about a couple of hundred feet above the ground it just completely vanished. i did not see it or anything else after that. after it disappeared i thought, wow, did i just see a ufo? it was actually pretty cool because since i was a young boy i have wanted to actually see a ufo.
content.summary: Driving west on i-10, east of san antonio and saw a bright light fall very fast, almost to the ground, then disappear.

content.detailedDescription: We have a houseboat on lake camanche and live in the area as well. we decided to take family out on the houseboat during memorial weekend for 3 days and 2 nights. we took the houseboat thru the narrows and parked it in china gulch cove on our first day out. we remained anchored at this location for the duration of our 3 day camping trip. this is a remote area of the lake with no camping or housing nearby. there were a number of boats we saw at the beginning of our trip in and around the cove we were in, but by our 2nd day (monday), they had all left the area. we were the only ones left out there by monday evening. we went to bed at a decent hour that night and i slept on the top deck bunkroom with my oldest son. all the slider windows were open to let the breeze through. i woke up having to use the restroom sometime during the night, not knowing what time it was. i noticed all the stars were out with no clouds in the sky and no glow from the sunrise yet. after using the restroom, i climbed back in bed and while laying there, i was looking out the open window near my head at the stars. after only a minute or so, i noticed a light coming from far off in the east with a path right in our direction. i assumed it was a jet coming over the sierra's heading toward the valley with it's yellowish light on the front. over the course of another minute or two as it approached, i realized it was also descending rather rapidly as well. and it wasn't as far off as i initially thought. the night was so still and quiet, i could hear tree frogs croaking and fish eating bugs off the topwater. because of this, i was waiting to hear some type of engine noise from this object approaching. there was no noise at all. by this point, i've gotten up onto my knees and had my face pressed to the window screen trying to hear anything from this object that has now reached the cove we were anchored in. it finally stops at the opposite side of the cove from our position in the houseboat. i'd estimate the distance across the water at about 300 yards. the object is right in line with the treetops behind it that are on the hillside (maybe 100 feet off the water). i also notice the light is reflecting off the water from the object. it's a solid yellowish color and bright, but easy to look at with your eyes even though it's dark outside. no blinking lights. i'd estimate the size to be equivalent to a large passenger car or suv, but round. it stopped and remained at this position and motionless for about a minute as i'm trying to make sense of it. then, it begins moving abruptly in all directions. sometimes it would move in a surging motion to the left maybe 100 feet, then fall downward 20 feet, then bounce back up very fast. at that point, i got nervous and stumbled downstairs looking thru the windows to not lose sight of it. i had no plan of what to do as i fumbled around in the dark, but in the process, i woke up my father-in-law from his bunk and told him to come outside with me to see this thing. in the process, i find my phone on the kitchen counter and see that its 4:12 a.M. we step out to the back deck of the boat and i notice it's just hovering perfectly still again. as i'm telling him what i had just witnessed, my mother-in-law wakes up and joins us on the deck. as i'm almost done telling them both what i had seen the object do, it begins bouncing around again. i can best describe the movements as if you were to throw a rubber bouncy ball on gravel. it would bounce all over the place and be very unpredictable. then it would return to a hovering position and always stay in the same vicinity. a few times it would go from a perfectly still hover to almost a shiver movement, where it would appear to be vibrating from side to side. after several minutes it returned to hovering when we noticed it began to turn on or "grow" a red light off the side of it. the light was a brilliant red color, but it wasn't like a red light. it resembled something like if a bright red beach ball was slowly inflated and illuminated. the edges of this red ball were perfectly crisp, not like looking at a typical red light in the darkness. then within 30 seconds or so, the red light evenly shrank down and was not visible anymore. the object hovered and bounced in front of us, and in the same specific area for quite some time (maybe 35 plus minutes.) i took pictures and video with my phone, but the footage doesn't do it justice. the pics/video makes it look so much further away and everything appears pitch black, whereas in person, we could see the hillside behind the object and the tree top silhouettes. by this time, the glow from the sun is becoming visible and it's around 5:00 a.M. i begin to notice that the object is ever so slowly ascending in a south-easterly direction as time passes. it is not visibly bouncing or shivering anymore, but is ascending so slowly, that you can only realize it by where it was positioned 5-10 minutes prior. it continued to ascend over the course of 30-40 minutes until it looked just like one of the last stars in the sky as the sun crested from the east. it was around 5:50 a.M. when the object finally became too difficult to see as it ascended so high in the sky with the sun beginning to rise.
content.summary: Orb flew into remote lake cove in early morning hours and hovered around for extended amount of time.

content.detailedDescription: Husband and wife driving to concert on oct 14 around 6 pm witnessed. object in the sky during thunderstorm took picture
content.summary: Husband wife driving witnessed object in sky during terrible storm took picture

content.detailedDescription: While we were driving down the road around 8:45pm eastern time looking towards the ne we saw 3 very bright objects in the sky.  they were fairly close together and seemed in a triangular formation. two blinked out and disappeared and the third stayed in sight.  it was moving a bit erratic and we were able to pull over and film it. it lingered for what seemed like a minute or two and then vanished like the other ones did.  it had no sound that we could hear.  it was close enough i would have heard a sound.  we live near an airport so i am familiar with helicopters and airplanes and the colors and sounds.  this was very different from anything i had ever seen. i will be uploading the video to youtube because it is a large file.  video doesn't do what we saw justice.  it appears white in the video but was more orange-yellowish in color and seemed much brighter in real life. i have included screen shots i zoomed in on from the original video.
content.summary: 3 very bright yellow/orange objects.  2 vanished and 1 lingered for a couple minutes before it disappeared as well.  it moved a little erratic.

content.detailedDescription: Seen black every big black triangle no sound flying over head
content.summary: Black triangle

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking out the trash after 8 pm. it was already dark. a bright yellow light caught my attention. i looked up to see a very bright yellow light in the sky. it was coming from the north heading south. i stood there like an idiot with my mouth open, the trash bag all but forgotten in my hand. at first i thought it was an airplane on fire. no sound was coming from the object so i knew it wasn't an airplane. it was flying low enough that i should have heard something. i watched it slowly cross the sky in front of me. i followed it in my yard until the trees blocked it from view. thinking it was over, i turned to the street where several cars and trucks had stopped to watch it as well. that's when i noticed the 2nd one. same as the first, it traveled in almost the exact path. then a 3rd one appeared. this one was much closer to the 2nd one. cars and trucks were still pulling over to watch, with horns honking. i watched the 2nd and 3rd one until they disappeared behind the tree line, still with my mouth open. after the "show" i put the trash in the can and headed inside, the cars and trucks continued on their way to wherever. i rushed inside to put a post on facebook asking if anyone else saw what i did. i called my brother and his wife to tell them about my experience and they told me to contact you here.
what i saw exactly was just a bright ball (3) going across the sky. no color or shape could be seen other than i could tell there were appendages on the sides. it traveled very slowly in a straight path at a constant rate of speed. the first one was a good distance ahead of the second two.
content.summary: 3 bright yellow balls traveled very slowly across the sky.

content.detailedDescription: 3 lights in a line, grew intensely bright. seemed to be in space. the dimmed and disappeared, no movement. then two satellite line objects appeared and crossed its path from an opposite direction. then 2 aircraft with no noise at high altitude came quickly and left.
content.summary: 3 lights appeared with increased brightness no movement, disappeared. 2 additional satellite like objects came in and left and then high altitude aircraft came and left.

content.detailedDescription: I was on the balcony of my two story small condo complex at around 1:30 am with my dog. i was stargazing and trying to spot constellations for around eight or so minutes when i began to get existential and think about aliens and other extraterrestrial life. i was looking around and i began to think about how some people are called out to look at the night sky at random times and see craft. 10 seconds after i had thought this i had seen this dark craft which was coming in a straight path right at me. i believe the craft was boomerang shaped because of the lights on the bottom. the form of the craft was hard to distinguish and almost seemed to be dimmed, fogged or blurry, yet there was no cloud or fog cover. the craft was large and moved from the treeline of my neighbors house in the east, towards me in the west, making a low humming, almost jet-like noise. it hovered over my house, probably 250 feet above me. i was paralyzed with fear. it was dark and i didn't bother seeing what my dog was doing. i could feel my pulse in my ears and i began to shake. i quickly decided i needed to go inside. my dog seemed distracted and i yanked her inside my bedroom. i went onto my bed and began to call my friends to describe my encounter and recieve some comfort. i have no idea where the craft went after this. that night i was feeling as though it was surreal, due to its fogged appearance and how it appeared after i had began to think about ufos and that maybe i had hallucinated. i doubt this because i wasn't tired, on any medical or hallucinagenic drugs and the fact i was scared.
content.summary: Stargazing on balcony when approached by boomerang

content.detailedDescription:
First let me say wow!!! never been in such awe in my life at an engineering marvel

i went outside at 3:48 am 10/13/2017 at 30°15'58.5"n 81°44'01.4"w
 i saw clear as day a diamond shaped object with a blunted rear. large cylindrical shaped matte green lights were similar to doughnut shaped circles that were phosphorescent but did not emit any light pollution outside of the light itself or within the center. it was not far i would estimate 500ft up or whatever the ceiling height of the cloud cover was. about 200 ft away. size of about six houses maybe as large as twelve in mass. i was awestruck at the magnificence and engineering that went into it. i could see the louver like body on the craft and the design was like plates were set similar to a red clay roof as if the heat was dispersed by the space behind each plate. the sound may be in the video however my ac unit could have caused that. i would pass any lie detector test on this i am 100% certain of what i saw.
 
i am going to do my best to have an image rendered. i could pass a lie detector test on this. i was not open minded on this and grew up in bermuda. i am now very interested and am setting cameras up to record any 
anomalies. 
i have video however it may need some editing to be able to get a clear view of what i saw. i have tried to analyze the video and found some peculiar issues. 

i was completely awe struck. after about ten seconds i was able to look away to open the camera on my phone up. the light from the screen disrupted my focus. i took a video but the video is all black. i took another one to see why and the other video shows the clouds clearly . idk what happened but for a good 10 seconds i was frozen in awe at the engineering into it and finally allowed myself to look away from it. once i looked at my phone the light on the phone messed my focus up and the video was all black while i was recording. the audio part being in it really makes me question it. the video comes back into focus as i take the camera out of the view.



last thing that gets me really thinking. the video with nothing at all on it is 2.38mb... the one with the clouds apparent is 965kb - the one with video on it should be higher. something isnt showing up. i need a video expert
content.summary: Doughnut shaped matte green glowing lights seem like engines. picture perfect sighting of the hull. left awe struck

content.detailedDescription:
Part 1:

my wife (kim) and i were sitting on our rear deck, the object appeared over the trees from nne (approximately 330 degrees relative to our position)  object appeared about the size of an aspirin held at arms length.  object was very bright, much brighter that background stars.  object did not display any "normal" aircraft marker lights of any kind - which is what really caught our attention.  also, there was no sound whatsoever.   the objects speed seemed slow (guess at 100 mph) slower than light aircraft in and out of hayward airport.
both kim and i got our binoculars (good 7x50 and 10x50) and continued to observe.  the object appeared to be on a course of 100 degrees, shortly after the object passed overhead, the object appeared to make a mild turn to a new heading of approximately 80 degrees.  the object continued on this heading for another 1-2 minutes.  then the object appeared to "turn off its light" - the bright "searchlight" was extinguished, consequently,  a smaller reddish "dot" was visible.  at this time, we guessed the object's distance at 3 to 5 miles.  the object continued until out of sight.

part 2:

at 8:05 an object appeared to the west of us, travelling south to north, at a distance of approximately 5 to 10 miles.  estimated speed - approximately 250 to 350 mph.  this object appeared to have the same characteristics as the previous object (without the "searchlight"), we wondered if they were the same.

question: is there any agency doing a "scanning" program?  for mapping, for a geological study? for earthquake study?  

the reason that i ask, we have viewed objects in the past, displaying similar "surveying" characteristics.  just a thought.
content.summary: Very bright light travelling slowly from nne to sse, then just past overhead, object did mild turn to ese

content.detailedDescription: For many years since the occurance i have never heard anyone make mention of this. it was the eve of easter 1975. i was sleeping when i was awakened by the sound of sirens. it seemed to last for hours. the following day i was at a church dinner. i asked if anyone knew the reason for the sirens the night before. one of the attendants was a radar operator for the air-force base located in the area. he told me that glowing lights appeared following/chasing all the mp vehicles on patrol that night. (later it remined me of a scene from close encounters) it only occurred that one time to my knowledge. do you know of this event?
content.summary: Glowing orbs of lights following/chasing militart and public police vehicles through the streets of baumholder w. germany

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my freiends tailgate when from south west area up in sky saw an egg shaped oval ufo very bright and glowing . it was fallowed well tryed to keep up was an military jet which was realy trying coild here it then the ufo shot straight up into the stars . jet made a wide turn back to westside i was still stuned even to this day i saw a ufo went to look up books yup many pictures of same ufo i wanted to add this cause it needs to be after all these years just feel better i did thank you   sincerly ralph e franco.
content.summary: Heart beat type motions zig zag

content.detailedDescription:
I was strolling in lisbon by the river tejo, next to the padrao dos descobrimentos monument when i noticed a strange cluster of lights on the sky moving at very high altitude. it was clearly visible as it was a dark night already with no light pollution on the river or left river bank where i was standing. the phenomena reminded me the pattern of a cloud of chaff or the light reflections on waves at the sea, except the ones on the sky moved steadily and seemed to glow and flicker, were very high above the few clouds (so much so i could not see the countours) and were following a straight flight pattern, from south to north at surely high speed -since the moment i saw them above the right river bank until they vanished from view on the city hills on the left bank around 15 mn passed, on a path that would have made it overfly the lisbon airport.

and yet another strange fact; i am an aviation enthusiast and this summer as portugal and lisbon have become a much sought after tourist hotspot, i have been tracking for the past 2 months the arrivals of scores of planes, which land in large numbers from a sw flight path coming from the right (south) river bank of the tejo river, a bit off the bridge, every 5 mn or so.
after the dissapearing of the strange lights from my visual standingpoint, i was much further intrigued by the fact that dozens of outgoing flights were now departing from lisbon airport not on the very common south-north runway axis  but rather taking the usual inbound flight path, i.E., precisely on the opposite direction of the strange lights as if for some reason they were avoiding a possible crossing of their path. i am also a frequent flyer to man destinations all over the world and never have any of my flights took off across the city skyline, having inclusively to then make steep turns to go to their destinations as i observed yesterday.

ps: i took one photo with my iphone se and a short video, where it seems there is a central cluster with small independent "orbs" next to it. also, apparently and as far as i can tell, dozens of bystanders, mostly tourists were baffled as i and taking pictures and videos with their smartphones, and furthermore i checked with portuguese ufo associations and this exact sightings have been multiplying this year alone mostly in lisbon area but also in algarve (southern tip of the country).
content.summary: A huge cluster of lights - bright starlike- that crossed the sky at very high altitude

content.detailedDescription:
When leaving the reef restaurant and looking north over the harbor toward the city, saw at least 20 bright white lights in the sky. they were about the same size as the distant stars, but brighter, and moving and swirling overhead. some lights formed triangles, and other shapes as they spread apart and moved overhead toward the southwest.
my group of 4 watched the lights, and talked about them to several others on the sidewalk beside the water also amazed by the lights. i first thought they were chinese lanterns, but their lights where steady and bright white. not like the yellow flames of lanterns and the kept flying or floating until they were out of sight. there was a plane that seemed to be above the lights. and a helicopter was flying nearby but did not seem to be aware of the lights, so they may have been above it.
content.summary: A swarm of bright lights, 20+, rising above long beach skyline, outspreading and vanishing.

content.detailedDescription: Ceiling 4,000 broken. craft was a huge wedge scud running in the broken layer reported at 4,000 by eglin & 7,000 by destin. speed est over 250 kn. only visible for seconds, no opportunity for a pic. light to white in color as if blending with cloud color, leading edge was white. no noise, dead quite, enormous and fast! headed west toward hurlburt... 10:25pm cdt 14oct17
content.summary: Large lite color boomerang/triangle high speed no noise

content.detailedDescription:
We live in a south indian city called trichy. when i and my son 10 years old went up to the terrace in our apartment for an evening walk on july 17, 2016 at around 6 pm in the evening , we saw 3 beams of light in the sky.
they formed triangular shape and were moving around in the same place after which a bat started circling above our head in a strange way. since it was strange so we came down to our home quickly
content.summary: Triangular lights reveloving

content.detailedDescription: Bright white lights fading away from the sky
content.summary: We were sitting outside next thing you know it got a little bright we looked up to the northeast and saw two bright lights parallel with each other fading away

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving east when i noticed up in the sky straight a head a large black sqaure object that 
looked like it had holes or windows. i couldn’t see exactly. i watched it moving in front of me but so far away and large.  at first i thought maybe it was a sign but there was no aircraft 
and it moved too fast . i tried to take a picture while at a traffic stop but could not get a close enough picture with my cell phone. then it was gone. i wondered if anyone else saw what i saw. now i wished i had been able to get out of my car before it was gone.
content.summary: While driving i saw object in the sky straight ahead but moving from e to ne very fast

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on my front porch smoking a cigarette. i looked to my left which would have been towards the nw. the light was flying towards me. i kept watching because of the brightness of the light. i expected to eventually see flashing lights that woul normally be on an airplane. as the light got closer over head no flashing lights ever appeared. at this time i opened the front door and had my mother look at the light with me. at this time it was directly over her. it continued on the same path until it dimmed out slowly. then it was just gone. then there was another light flying in the opposite direction over head but this light was much higher and no where near as bright. there were also 3-4 airplanes in the area.
content.summary: Very bright white light flying in a straight line then dimmed out completely. then a higher dimmer light flying in opposite direction

content.detailedDescription: Sitting on a couch looking out the door on a sunny day.  i was facing lockheed and had a perfect view of planes taking off.  planes usually don't take off during the day here and it was 1pm.  i noticed what i thought was a drone hovering over the trees at the house next door.  i said to my two friends hey there is a drone.  it hovered over the trees and i said again, do you see it? just then my friend on the right of me stood up and said where? i said right there, over the trees.  i too stood up and followed him outside.  as i did this, the drone shot straight up and was gone by the time i got outside-about 10 steps.  i realized the drone wasn't flying like a turtle, with four legs under it, it was like a turtle walking upright, like a cross, as it hovered.  maybe drones do this now, i'm not sure, but it disappeared in a second-faster than a plane.
content.summary: Thought it was a drone, but it didn't fly like one and dissappeard really fast.

content.detailedDescription: I was wide awake for some strange reason that night and something just said go outside....As soon as went outside it felt like the energy from the big glowing light instantly grabbed my attention. at first i thought i was the moon until i realized the moon was on the other side of the sky  at first the to light just glowed very very bright...Then beams of light glowed out of each side of the big lights. there was something very shiny, way bigger then a star between the two bright ligjts that sat still no glowing twinkling nothing just kinda oblong light. it's the image to the left of all of that that really terrified me.I couldn't see that figure with my eyes. i actually accidentally caught it recording the lights. it was very scary i used different lighting to bring it out and it definitely looks like a ufo. when the lights left it looked like someone just turned off a ligjt switch. they didnt fly away, drop away, they just went off
content.summary: Very different then normal colored big bright lights that projected beams...It's the image to the left of it all that scares me

content.detailedDescription: I was wide awake for some strange reason that night and something just said go outside....As soon as went outside it felt like the energy from the big glowing light instantly grabbed my attention. at first i thought i was the moon until i realized the moon was on the other side of the sky  at first the to light just glowed very very bright...Then beams of light glowed out of each side of the big lights. there was something very shiny, way bigger then a star between the two bright ligjts that sat still no glowing twinkling nothing just kinda oblong light. it's the image to the left of all of that that really terrified me.I couldn't see that figure with my eyes. i actually accidentally caught it recording the lights. it was very scary i used different lighting to bring it out and it definitely looks like a ufo. when the lights left it looked like someone just turned off a ligjt switch. they didnt fly away, drop away, they just went off
content.summary: Very different then normal colored big bright lights that projected beams...It's the image to the left of it all that scares me

content.detailedDescription: I was wide awake for some strange reason that night and something just said go outside....As soon as went outside it felt like the energy from the big glowing light instantly grabbed my attention. at first i thought i was the moon until i realized the moon was on the other side of the sky  at first the to light just glowed very very bright...Then beams of light glowed out of each side of the big lights. there was something very shiny, way bigger then a star between the two bright ligjts that sat still no glowing twinkling nothing just kinda oblong light. it's the image to the left of all of that that really terrified me.I couldn't see that figure with my eyes. i actually accidentally caught it recording the lights. it was very scary i used different lighting to bring it out and it definitely looks like a ufo. when the lights left it looked like someone just turned off a ligjt switch. they didnt fly away, drop away, they just went off
content.summary: Very different then normal colored big bright lights that projected beams...It's the image to the left of it all that scares me
